main event: A civilian observer reported a triangular orange object moving erratically in the sky over Altus, Oklahoma, on June 29, 1960.
interesting points: The observation lasted approximately 1 minute., The object was described as triangular and orange in color., It moved in an erratic zig-zag pattern., The object approached to within 2-3 miles before speeding up and disappearing., The observer was an amateur astronomer who considered the sighting reliable.
witness description: a civilian amateur astronomer with an above average interest in UFO sightings
